field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the OSPF service if routing protocols are enabled in "General".

field.label: Passive Interfaces
field.help: Select the interfaces, where no OSPF packets should be sent to.

field.label: Route Redistribution
field.help: Select other routing sources, which should be redistributed to the other nodes.
field.hint: Type or select a route source.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway.

field.label: Always Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway, regardless of if it is available.
